video_prompt: A subtle breeze rustles her white shawl and strands of her silver hair. Her eyes softly blink, and a faint breath rises from her chest. The delicate chains and charms on her armor gently sway. In the background, the light subtly flickers from unseen sources.

refined_video_prompt: Her white shawl and silver hair gently sway. Her eyes gracefully blink, and a soft breath emanates from her chest. The delicate chains on her armor gently sway. In the background, light subtly dances.
creative_video_prompt_1: Her eyes blaze open, silver hair whipping as a violent gust rips through her shawl, transforming it into a tattered banner. The chains on her armor thrash wildly, morphing into coiling tendrils that grip a massive sword. The ground shatters beneath her, sending debris rocketing. Unseen forces lash out, distorting the ancient architecture into grotesque, writhing forms, as she lunges forward in a blinding, explosive burst of speed.
creative_video_prompt_2: A celestial symphony deafens existence. Her platinum hair, entwined with starlight, unfurls into a vortex, swallowing the castle columns. The white shawl dissolves into a milky way, orbiting her, while her armored roses blossom into black holes, devouring light. Time reverses; her blink reshapes the universe. The charms, now molten constellations, drip upwards, forming new realities. The very air, thick with dreams, distorts, pulling impossible colors from invisible spectrums, as she becomes the void.
creative_video_prompt_3: A slow, deliberate zoom from her eyes, descending to her armored chest, highlights the shifting light on metallic roses. The camera pans gracefully to her right, revealing the sword, then smoothly tilts upwards along its blade, following the path of a shimmering light as it disappears into the darkness. Subtle whispers from unseen figures echo in the silence.
